title.rendered: AUDIO: Life After Hockey – Interview with VINE Group’s Johnson Andrews

content.rendered:
Our very own Johnson Andrews was interviewed by the weekly podcast “Life After Hockey” presented by TSN. Prior to joining VINE Group as our Senior Credit Analyst, Johnson was a hockey all-star playing in the OHL for the Niagara IceDogs and with Brock University where he completed his MBA in 2017.

Listen to the full interview in the link below!

Listen to the full […]
